election_record.label: Rhode Island 1818 Clerk of the House of Representatives

office.name: Clerk of the House of Representatives

role.title: Clerk of the House of Representatives

overview.note: "Thomas Burgess, Esq., the Federal candidate, was chosen clerk by a majority of 2, in opposition to Dexter Randall, Esq., the Democratic candidate; this result was surprising to all parties, as the Democrats had a majority of 3 in the House." Dedham Gazette (Dedham, MA). May 15, 1818.
"Strange as it may seem the aristocratic candidate was elected by a majority of two!" Providence Patriot and Columbian Phenix (Providence, RI). May 9, 1818.
